mapper.select: select * from tbl_salary order by employee_id asc
select pay_yearmonth, emp.employee_id, emp_name, emp.JOB_ID, salary, premium, sum from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_salarylist slist on emp.employee_id = slist.employee_id

select pay_yearmonth, emp.employee_id, emp_name, emp.JOB_ID, salary, premium, sum from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_salarylist slist on emp.employee_id = slist.employee_id where DATE_FORMAT(slist.pay_yearmonth, '%Y-%m') = #{keyword};
select salary, bonus, premium from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_salarylist slist on emp.employee_id = slist.employee_id where emp.employee_id = #{emp_id};

select emp.employee_id, emp_name, JOB_ID, department from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_salarylist slist on emp.employee_id = slist.employee_id where DATE_FORMAT(slist.pay_yearmonth, '%Y-%m') = #{keyword};

select emp.employee_id, emp_name, JOB_ID, department, sal.bank, sal.account, sal.account_holder from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_salary sal on emp.employee_id = sal.employee_id where emp.employee_id = #{employee_id};
mapper.update: update tbl_salary set bank = #{bank}, account = #{account}, account_holder = #{account_holder} where employee_id = #{employee_id}
